name: Chompin' Cop
description:
Chomp on red-shirts with your bobble-head to gather points. 

Visit the Porta-Potty to deposit your points. 

Get as many points as you can before the timer runs out!

Don't chomp the civilians! (average-sized green men)

Controls:

[W][A][S][D] to move

Mouse to look around

works with controller as well
